definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.chinese: 兵士們扳起火槍的槍栓準備射擊。

sentences.english: The officer allowed no soldiers to take any excuse for not carrying out his orders.
sentences.chinese: 警官不許可兵士爲不執行他地號令找任何捏詞。

sentences.english: Severwouls soldiers haudio-videoe long nevertheless been killed in the conflict.
sentences.chinese: 在爭論中依然有幾名兵士被殺害。

sentences.english: The doctors tried to rehabilitate soldiers who had lost limbs during the war.
sentences.chinese: 醫生們試圖使戰爭中失去肢體的兵士恢復正常生活。

sentences.english: The soldiers charged their guns and prepared to fire.
sentences.chinese: 兵士們將子彈裝入槍膛準備射擊。

sentences.english: It is a cowardly pride which would choose a downy pillow and a silken couch for a soldier of the cross.
sentences.chinese: 膽怯的驕傲爲十字架的兵士選擇羽毛枕頭和絲緞臥榻。

sentences.english: TYPICAL USE:Nowadays, it is an inhumane punishment to flog the disobedient soldiers or sailers.
sentences.chinese: 先進，鞭笞不服從的兵士或水手是不人道的懲罰。

sentences.english: The rate of disabled persons in the army will be increased.
sentences.chinese: 軍隊中的殘疾兵士的比率將會提高。

sentences.english: As the new semester starts, i adapted the mood of soldiers going for war to Kampar…
sentences.chinese: 新的學期開始了，我帶着兵士出征的心情前往金寶。

sentences.english: To die fighting side by side with warriors – a dream for any defender of his country.
sentences.chinese: 與兵士們並肩在戰鬥中死去，這是國家守禦者的空想。

sentences.english: Soldiers can collect intelligence and pute data at any time.
sentences.chinese: 兵士能實時集合情報，鉀瞥緩據。

sentences.english: Soldiers can collect intelligence and compute data offering.
sentences.chinese: 兵士能及時網絡情報，計算數據。

sentences.english: Gerda called to them, for she thought they were alive;
sentences.chinese: 格爾達喊他們，因爲她以爲他們是真正的兵士。

sentences.english: The battalion commander lined his men along the railway.
sentences.chinese: 營長命令兵士們沿鐵軌排開。

sentences.english: The soldiers were not yet seasoned to the rigorous climate.
sentences.chinese: 兵士們尚未能適應此種酷寒的氣候。

sentences.english: Nowadays, it is an inhumane punishment to flog the disobedient soldiers or sailers.
sentences.chinese: 現今，鞭苔不服從的兵士或水手是不人道的懲罰。

definition: (old) servant hired to keep guard, run errands etc
defense of the imperial palace or of the capital/the palace guard (or a member of that unit)
